      private String PigTableScan.getConcatenatedFieldNameAndTypeForPigSchema(PigRel.Implementor implementor, RelDataTypeField field) 
      private List<String> PigAggregate.getDistinctCalls(PigRel.Implementor implementor)
      A agg function call like COUNT(DISTINCT COL) in Pig is achieved via two statements in a FOREACH that follows a GROUP statement: TABLE = GROUP TABLE ALL;
      TABLE = FOREACH TABLE {
        COL.DISTINCT = DISTINCT COL;
        GENERATE COUNT(COL.DISTINCT) AS C;
      }
      private List<String> PigAggregate.getPigAggregateCalls(PigRel.Implementor implementor)
